languages.text: {n}Узнав о заступничестве Вольного Торговца, каторжане со слезами вознесли молитвы за {mf|Его|Ее} Светлость. Надзиратели милостиво воздержались от мщения, вздернув лишь заводил мятежа, против чего не протестовали даже сами невольники — а как же еще?{/n}

{n}Having learned of the Rogue Trader's intercession on their behalf, the convicts wept and prayed for {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}. The overseers have generously abstained from vengeance, only hanging the ones who provoked the riot, the convicts not lifting a finger in protest — and how else would they react?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Узнав о заступничестве Вольного Торговца, каторжане со слезами вознесли молитвы за {mf|Его|Ее} Светлость. Надзиратели милостиво воздержались от мщения, вздернув лишь заводил мятежа, против чего не протестовали даже сами невольники — а как же еще?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Having learned of the intercession from the Rogue Trader, the convicts wept and prayed for {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}. The wardens have generously abstained from vengeance, only hanging the ones who provoked the riot, and even the slaves did not protest against it — how else could it be?{/n}

{n}Having learned of the intercession from the Rogue Trader, the convicts wept and prayed for {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}. The wardens have generously abstained from vengeance, only hanging the ones who provoked the riot, and even the slaves did not protest against it — how else could it be?{/n}

{n}Having learned of the Rogue Trader's intercession on their behalf, the convicts wept and prayed for {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}. The wardens have generously abstained from vengeance, only hanging the ones who provoked the riot, the slaves not lifting a finger in protest — and how else would they react?{/n}

{n}Having learned of the Rogue Trader's intercession on their behalf, the convicts wept and prayed for {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}. The wardens have generously abstained from vengeance, only hanging the ones who provoked the riot, the slaves not lifting a finger in protest — and how else would they react?{/n}

{n}Having learned of the Rogue Trader's intercession on their behalf, the convicts wept and prayed for {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}. The overseers have generously abstained from vengeance, only hanging the ones who provoked the riot, the convicts not lifting a finger in protest — and how else would they react?{/n}

languages.text: {n}得知行商浪人为他们说情后，所有囚犯都喜极而泣，纷纷为{mf|他|她}祈祷。看守们慷慨地放弃了复仇，只绞死了那些挑起骚乱的人，其他奴隶完全没有一丁点抗议的念头。毕竟他们已经得到了这样的恩惠，还能有什么不满呢？{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Having learned of the Rogue Trader's intercession on their behalf, the convicts wept and prayed for {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}. The wardens have generously abstained from vengeance, only hanging the ones who provoked the riot, the slaves not lifting a finger in protest — and how else would they react?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}得知行商浪人为他们说情后，所有囚犯都喜极而泣，纷纷为{mf|他|她}祈祷。看守们慷慨地放弃了复仇，只绞死了那些挑起骚乱的人，其他奴隶完全没有一丁点抗议的念头。毕竟他们已经得到了这样的恩惠，还能有什么不满呢？{/n}

languages.text: {n}Al enterarse de la intervención {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente en su favor, los convictos lloraron y rezaron. Los guardias se han contenido generosamente a la hora de vengarse, ahorcando solamente a los que provocaron el motín, y los esclavos no han movido un dedo en señal de protesta... ¿y cómo reaccionarían si no?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Having learned of the Rogue Trader's intercession on their behalf, the convicts wept and prayed for {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}. The wardens have generously abstained from vengeance, only hanging the ones who provoked the riot, the slaves not lifting a finger in protest — and how else would they react?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Al enterarse de la intervención {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente en su favor, los convictos lloraron y rezaron. Los guardias se han contenido generosamente a la hora de vengarse, ahorcando solamente a los que provocaron el motín, y los esclavos no han movido un dedo en señal de protesta... ¿y cómo reaccionarían si no?{/n}

languages.text: {n}ローグトレーダーが自分たちのために執り成しをしてくれたことを知った受刑者たちは、泣きながら陛下に祈りを捧げた。看守は寛大にも復讐を控え、暴動を引き起こした者のみを絞首刑に処したため、奴隷たちは抗議しようとはしなかった...それ以外にどんな反応があるだろうか？{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Having learned of the Rogue Trader's intercession on their behalf, the convicts wept and prayed for {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}. The wardens have generously abstained from vengeance, only hanging the ones who provoked the riot, the slaves not lifting a finger in protest — and how else would they react?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ローグトレーダーが自分たちのために執り成しをしてくれたことを知った受刑者たちは、泣きながら陛下に祈りを捧げた。看守は寛大にも復讐を控え、暴動を引き起こした者のみを絞首刑に処したため、奴隷たちは抗議しようとはしなかった...それ以外にどんな反応があるだろうか？{/n}

languages.text: {n}Apprenant que {mf|le|la} libre-{mf|marchand|marchande} a intercédé en leur faveur, les détenus se mettent à pleurer et à prier en son honneur. Les gardiens s'abstiennent généreusement de toute vengeance, n'exécutant que ceux qui avaient déclenché l'émeute. Les esclaves ne lèvent pas le petit doigt pour protester... comment pourraient-ils faire autrement ?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Having learned of the Rogue Trader's intercession on their behalf, the convicts wept and prayed for {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}. The wardens have generously abstained from vengeance, only hanging the ones who provoked the riot, the slaves not lifting a finger in protest — and how else would they react?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Apprenant que {mf|le|la} libre-{mf|marchand|marchande} a intercédé en leur faveur, les détenus se mettent à pleurer et à prier en son honneur. Les gardiens s'abstiennent généreusement de toute vengeance, n'exécutant que ceux qui avaient déclenché l'émeute. Les esclaves ne lèvent pas le petit doigt pour protester... comment pourraient-ils faire autrement ?{/n}

languages.text: {n}Als die Sträflinge erfuhren, dass {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} sich für sie eingesetzt hatte, weinten sie und priesen {mf|seine Lordschaft|ihre Ladyschaft}. Die Wärter sahen großzügig von einer Vergeltung ab und hängten nur die Rädelsführer des Aufstands. Die Sklaven protestierten nicht — was hätten sie auch tun sollen?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Having learned of the Rogue Trader's intercession on their behalf, the convicts wept and prayed for {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}. The wardens have generously abstained from vengeance, only hanging the ones who provoked the riot, the slaves not lifting a finger in protest — and how else would they react?{/n}

Die Wärter sahen großzügig von einer Vergeltung ab und hängten nur die Rädelsführer des Aufstands. Die Sklaven protestierten nicht — was hätten sie auch tun sollen?{/n}
